page.title: 08CAMSLEY GRANGE FARM
page.content: My name is Lesley Wright and I live on Camsley Grange Farm which is on the outskirts of Lymm and Thelwall. The farm occupies an area of 47 acres and our stock consists of 4 cows and 5 calves, 16 horses, 5 geese, 4 ducks and one hen. As pets I have 2 rabbits, 2 goldfish, 3 cats and 4 dogs one of which is a fevocious alsation which acts as a guard dog. On the farm the cows are used for breeding and the calves are sometimes sold at Chelford Market. One of the mares, an ex-race horse, is now too old for breeding but one of her foals was sold as a race horse. Eight of the horses are known as 'Liveries'. Their owners pay for food and stabling.
